Package com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.counting

Class RadixSort

java.lang.Object
com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.counting.RadixSort
public class RadixSort extends Object
Radix Sort Radix sort is an integer sorting algorithm that sorts data with integer keys by grouping the keys by individual digits that share the same significant position and value (place value). Radix sort uses counting sort as a subroutine to sort an array of numbers.

TESTME Disclaimer: This radix sort can only sort positive integers

Since:
13th May 2020

  • Method Details

    • findMaxInt

      public int findMaxInt(int[] numArr, int from, int to)
      findMaxInt method is used to find maximum number in the array within the provided range i.e from and to
      Parameters:
      numArr - It contains an array of numbers from which maximum value needs to be obtained
      from - This is the starting index from which scanning for maximum number will begin
      to - This is the ending index until which scanning for maximum number will be continued
      Returns:
      int This method returns maximum number between from index and to index

    • countSort

      public void countSort(int[] numArr, int exp, int from, int to)
      countSort method is implementation of basic counting sort algorithm. We provide exponent i.e unit's digit, ten's digit or hundred's digit etc on which counting sort needs to be performed
      Parameters:
      numArr - It contains an array of numbers on which counting sort needs to be performed
      exp - This is the exponent input on which counting sort would be performed e.g 1, 10, 100, 1000 etc.
      from - This is the starting index from which sorting operation will begin
      to - This is the ending index until which sorting operation will be continued

    • sort

      public void sort(int[] numArr, int from, int to) throws Exception
      sort method is implementation of radix sort algorithm.
      Parameters:
      numArr - It contains an array of numbers on which radix sort needs to be performed
      from - This is the starting index from which sorting operation will begin
      to - This is the ending index until which sorting operation will be continued
      Throws:
      Exception
